txt.en: Having difficulties finding quest objectives? The quest guide system has you covered! This special system will help point you to the general area of your tracked quest objectives using the map and radar displays. Open your options panel to the UI Settings and toggle the 'Enable Quest Guide' option to enable or disable the Quest Guide feature.

The quest guide system will help point you to the general area of your tracked quest objectives using the map and radar displays. Once you are in the general area for a quest target, the area name below your mini-map will begin to glow. Additionally, the quest tracker helps you check your progress on up to 10 quests at a time. You can open your quest journal to view the details of a quest in the tracker by clicking the icon next to the quest. Try right-clicking on the icon for even more options.\n\nNOTE: You can add and remove quests and deeds from the tracker using the appropriate journal.
